name: List-Map Flattener Processor
description: Takes a list of maps and flattens it by reading out a specific key of that map. The resulting list will only contain the value of the key field.

parameters.name: list_field
parameters.description: The name of the field that contains the list of maps.

parameters.name: map_field
parameters.description: The name of the field that needs to be extracted from the separate maps.

parameters.name: ignore_empty
parameters.description: If set to true, will only continue with non-empty values

parameters.name: overwrite
parameters.description: Whether or not to overwrite the original list_field.
